Name: Ninja Stealth 4
About the game: Ninja Stealth IV is a new challenge for you. Be stealth, evade from lasers, cameras, motion detectors and security guards. Collect all computers to beat the game. The Game: 30 new challenging levels New achievements Move without being detected Hide yourself behind the boxes Camouflage yourself as a box Collect all computers Do your best!
